A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
When Billy-Dee Williams was cast as Lando\, it wasn't to fill a quota. It was because he had the charm\, charisma\, looks\, voice\, screen-presence and talent to bring that character to life.
 
By contrast\, this film (especially Rose and Purple Hair) are cast specifically with thnic/gender quotas in mind. And they're terrible and annoying characters for that reason.

"That is why you fail\, Johnson!"
